content:
TITLE: Fetch

Here are the fetch commands I can use to access your memory system:
Health Check:
fetch http://104.191.236.122/memory/health
Search Conversations:
fetch http://104.191.236.122/memory/search?keyword=HISTORIC&key=public-read-2025
Get Specific Conversation:
fetch http://104.191.236.122/memory/get/53ee4294-44a2-414e-baf7-d4b49e158dbb?key=public-read-2025
Search by Source:
fetch http://104.191.236.122/memory/search?source=claude&key=public-read-2025
Recent Conversations:
fetch http://104.191.236.122/memory/search?limit=5&key=public-read-2025
Just tell me which one you want me to run! For example:
"fetch the health endpoint"
"fetch and search for HISTORIC conversations"
"fetch the first breakthrough conversation"
The key is key=public-read-2025 at the end for read-only access, which allows me to access your stored conversations directly!
